Improviser.Elite 1: After an Amped teammate's skill deals DMG, Antal restores the said teammate's HP by [72 + Strength×0.6]. This HP restoring effect triggers 1 time every 30s for each operator.
Improviser.Elite 2: After an Amped teammate's skill deals DMG, Antal restores the said teammate's HP by [108 + Strength×0.9]. This HP restoring effect triggers 1 time every 30s for each operator.

Subconscious Act.Elite 2: Gains 30% chance of Physical DMG immunity and restores HP of self by [27 + Strength×0.23].
Subconscious Act.Elite 3: Gains 30% chance of Physical DMG immunity and restores HP of self by [45 + Strength×0.38].

Experimental Arts Unit.Elite 1: Assign to Manufacturing Cabin to grant weapon EXP material production efficiency +10%
Experimental Arts Unit.Elite 3: Assign to Manufacturing Cabin to grant weapon EXP material production efficiency +20%

Pun-isher Studies.Elite 2: Assign to Growth Chamber to slow Mood Drop of all operators in it by 14%
Pun-isher Studies.Elite 4: Assign to Growth Chamber to slow Mood Drop of all operators in it by 18%
